isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: BENDIX TU-FLO 550 AND TU-FLO 750 - ASSEMBLE - BASE PLATE OR BASE ADAPTER

svcproc.title: BASE PLATE OR BASE ADAPTER
svcproc.para: Position the base plate or base adapter gasket (Item 20) on the crankcase and install the base plate or base adapter (Item 21) as marked before disassembly. Tighten the six capscrews (Item 22), securing the cast iron base adapter evenly and tighten to 175 to 225 in-lbs. (19.741 to 25.420 N•m) as specified in the TORQUE CHART for base plate or cover, in a crossing pattern, after first snugging all 6 screws.
